$interpreted: : This story happened in the early days of the famous Kingdom of the Sun civil war.
: Regent Theodore and Princess Angelia have publically declared war against each other. The two sides fought countless battles.
: However, not all battles are recorded in the history books.
: Only the selected Watchers are able to read them through the Book of Bequeathers.

: Once upon a time, under the shadow of a tree, with the sounds of piano chiming in one's ears,
an unknown battle has quietly begun...
Naya: The Bayer family has agreed to be on our side. That's great news! Looks like this trip through Theodore's territory was well worth the risk!
Angelia: Yes.
Angelia: However, I can already picture Colonel Dylan greeting us with a stern face when we return. We're definitely getting scolded for this...
Naya: Can't help it though. Bayer insisted that he will only negotiate with the princess herself.

Naya: But the area between the Infantry and Bayer territory belongs to Theodore's forces. 
The Colonel was worried about your safety, 
hence why he was against the idea of you coming here yourself.
Angelia: The soldiers of Sunshine Infantry and the Bears are all fighting hard for me. I can't be the only one that hides in safety all the time.
Naya: On top of that, it's no secret that we do need reinforcements...
Naya: It's getting late. We should get back as soon as possible!
Angelia: ... I wonder if Sione has already found out about our uninformed disappearance?
Naya: Oh god, I hope not! I really don't want to experience dear Sione's ice-cold glare. Gives me shivers...
Angelia: *Chuckles*...  So even the brave and bold Naya has times when she's scared of Sione~
Royal Sorcerer: This laughter...?
Royal Sorcerer: Traitor Angelia!?
Angelia: I recognize this person... He's a royal sorcerer under the direct command of uncle. Why is he here all alone by himself?
Naya: Perhaps... he's not alone.

Veteran Sorcerer: That brat, why is he taking so long?
He better not get busted by some random folks...
Rookie Sorcerer: Sir, we're here on the direct orders of King Theodore, right? If so, why are we doing all this in secret like we're hiding something?

Veteran Sorcerer: Still a rookie after all. If not for King Theodore's failed plans, the kingdom wouldn't have lost the Dragoneye Gem. 
Because of that incident, the capitol is now experiencing a serious energy shortage.

Rookie Sorcerer: So? It's not like we're out of options.
We set up the magic circle to absorb the Soul Energy. We can then turn that into usable energy~
Veteran Sorcerer: Idiot! This magic circle was designed on a whim. There's no guarantee that it will work. What if it failed?
Veteran Sorcerer: If we aren't careful, public outrage will turn into blame on his Majesty.
Veteran Sorcerer: Oh, I get it. Therefore, it's bad news if we were found out——
Puggi: ——This way! My amazing sixth sense tells me that this is a shortcut!
Pang: Master is still waiting for us to bring the herbs back. In addition, can't recall the last time you made the right selection...
Puggi: Aww Pang, Pang, Pang~~ Why so pessimistic? Trust me, I'm the main character——
Puggi: Hmm? Are you guys having a secret barbeque party?
Pang: ... I have a bad feeling about this...
Rookie Sorcerer: S, Sir. We have witnesses!
Veteran Sorcerer: Kill them!

Naya: So he really wasn't alone...
If he's so afraid to let the people find out, he shouldn't do shady things like this to begin with!
Angelia: For uncle, it's probably harder for him to trust the people.
Pang: You're... the one from the Prairie...
Naya: We can catch up later. Got to deal with them first!

Puggi: Praise Puggi; all hail Puggi~
You can only blame yourself for taunting the REAL MC~
Pang: These flashing lights... what's going on?
Angelia: It can't be... Did the magic circle get accidentally activated?
Naya: That's...! Guys, look up!
Angelia: ...... A little girl?
Alice: Hmm... Where am I? This isn't the treehouse, is it?
Alice: Deemo!
Alice: ... You're here as well...
Masked Girl: What, you don't want to see me? What a coincidence; I don't either.
Alice: That's not what I meant...
Masked Girl: ... So, we've come to the other side of the tree...
Alice: Am I home?
Masked Girl: The dream is a boundary. Reality to one side, fantasy on the other.
Alice: Umm. I don't understand what you're saying...
Masked Girl: It means you're now even further away from home than you were before. How about you just give up and stop trying to go back?
Alice: You......!
Angelia: ... Could it be that... you can't talk?
Deemo: ......
Naya: Monster! So many of them too! Why did they appear all of a sudden...!
Angelia: Are they attracted to this tree...
Angelia: The tree is...!
Alice: A white light...
Deemo: ......
Masked Girl: ... So I'm the gold one. Whatever, I'll take it.
Puggi: Huzzzzahhh!
Pang: Puggi! Damnit!
Masked Girl: Deemo!
Alice: Deemo!
Angelia: ... NO! Run!

Model.Text: This story happened in the early days of the famous Kingdom of the Sun civil war.
Regent Theodore and Princess Angelia have publically declared war against each other. The two sides fought countless battles.
However, not all battles are recorded in the history books.
Only the selected Watchers are able to read them through the Book of Bequeathers.

Once upon a time, under the shadow of a tree, with the sounds of piano chiming in one's ears,
an unknown battle has quietly begun...
The Bayer family has agreed to be on our side. That's great news! Looks like this trip through Theodore's territory was well worth the risk!
Yes.
However, I can already picture Colonel Dylan greeting us with a stern face when we return. We're definitely getting scolded for this...
Can't help it though. Bayer insisted that he will only negotiate with the princess herself.

But the area between the Infantry and Bayer territory belongs to Theodore's forces. 
The Colonel was worried about your safety, 
hence why he was against the idea of you coming here yourself.
The soldiers of Sunshine Infantry and the Bears are all fighting hard for me. I can't be the only one that hides in safety all the time.
On top of that, it's no secret that we do need reinforcements...
It's getting late. We should get back as soon as possible!
... I wonder if Sione has already found out about our uninformed disappearance?
Oh god, I hope not! I really don't want to experience dear Sione's ice-cold glare. Gives me shivers...
*Chuckles*...  So even the brave and bold Naya has times when she's scared of Sione~
This laughter...?
Traitor Angelia!?
I recognize this person... He's a royal sorcerer under the direct command of uncle. Why is he here all alone by himself?
Perhaps... he's not alone.

That brat, why is he taking so long?
He better not get busted by some random folks...
Sir, we're here on the direct orders of King Theodore, right? If so, why are we doing all this in secret like we're hiding something?

Still a rookie after all. If not for King Theodore's failed plans, the kingdom wouldn't have lost the Dragoneye Gem. 
Because of that incident, the capitol is now experiencing a serious energy shortage.

So? It's not like we're out of options.
We set up the magic circle to absorb the Soul Energy. We can then turn that into usable energy~
Idiot! This magic circle was designed on a whim. There's no guarantee that it will work. What if it failed?
If we aren't careful, public outrage will turn into blame on his Majesty.
Oh, I get it. Therefore, it's bad news if we were found out——
——This way! My amazing sixth sense tells me that this is a shortcut!
Master is still waiting for us to bring the herbs back. In addition, can't recall the last time you made the right selection...
Aww Pang, Pang, Pang~~ Why so pessimistic? Trust me, I'm the main character——
Hmm? Are you guys having a secret barbeque party?
... I have a bad feeling about this...
S, Sir. We have witnesses!
Kill them!

So he really wasn't alone...
If he's so afraid to let the people find out, he shouldn't do shady things like this to begin with!
For uncle, it's probably harder for him to trust the people.
You're... the one from the Prairie...
We can catch up later. Got to deal with them first!

Praise Puggi; all hail Puggi~
You can only blame yourself for taunting the REAL MC~
These flashing lights... what's going on?
It can't be... Did the magic circle get accidentally activated?
That's...! Guys, look up!
...... A little girl?
Hmm... Where am I? This isn't the treehouse, is it?
Deemo!
... You're here as well...
What, you don't want to see me? What a coincidence; I don't either.
That's not what I meant...
... So, we've come to the other side of the tree...
Am I home?
The dream is a boundary. Reality to one side, fantasy on the other.
Umm. I don't understand what you're saying...
It means you're now even further away from home than you were before. How about you just give up and stop trying to go back?
... Could it be that... you can't talk?
Monster! So many of them too! Why did they appear all of a sudden...!
Are they attracted to this tree...
The tree is...!
A white light...
... So I'm the gold one. Whatever, I'll take it.
Huzzzzahhh!
Puggi! Damnit!
Deemo!
Deemo!
... NO! Run!
